classify.name: long complex: full project plan
classify.input: I need you to help me build a full stack web application. First, set up the backend with express and postgresql. Then create the frontend with react and tailwind. The app should have user authentication, a dashboard, and an api for managing projects. I also need docker deployment scripts and CI/CD pipeline configuration. Let's start with the database schema and work our way up.
